hero.title: DiagZone Pro: Software for Diagnostic Equipment
hero.subtitle: We sell software for diagnostic equipment. Explore our connectors and check compatibility.

features.title: Professional Features
features.subtitle: Advanced tools for automotive diagnostics and repair.
features.feature1_desc: ADAS calibration, IMMO, TPMS PROG, and more.
features.feature2_desc: Read and clear codes on all systems.
features.feature3_desc: Wireless connection with your mobile device.

compatibility.title: HIGH COMPATIBILITY
compatibility.main_text: At DiagZone.io we have a wide range of scanners and bluetooth modules on the market, for <1>12 Volt</1> vehicle connectors, converter modules for <1>24 Volt (HD)</1> buses and trucks, and for <1>Electric (EV)</1> car connectors.
compatibility.secondary_text: In addition to supporting more than <1>42 special workshop functions</1>, <1>ADAS</1> systems calibration, <1>IMMO</1> Systems, and <1>TPMS PROG.</1>

downloads_page.title: Application Downloads
downloads_page.subtitle: Download the latest versions of our software.

connectors_page.title: All Connectors
connectors_page.subtitle: Explore our full range of compatible scanners.

footer.description: Professional automotive diagnostic platform with support for over 240 vehicle brands.
